name: VALENTINO
about: Checked linen, wool and silk-blend blazer
detail: Synonymous with elegance, Sachin & Babi is our go-to for statement-making eveningwear. Designers Sachin and Babi Ahluwalia launched their embroidery business in 1996 before focusing on ready-to-wear characterized by traditional Indian needlework. Watch for iconic satin gowns in deep, dazzling hues.
